solution_line_template: Robert earned a commission of ${total_sales} x {commission_percentage_numerator}/{commission_percentage_denominator} = $<<{total_sales}*{commission_percentage_numerator}/{commission_percentage_denominator}={commission_earned}>>{commission_earned}.
So, he earned a total of ${basic_salary} + ${commission_earned} = $<<{basic_salary}+{commission_earned}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
Therefore, his total expenses last month was ${total_earnings} - ${amount_saved}= $<<{total_earnings}-{amount_saved}={monthly_expenses}>>{monthly_expenses}
